metadata.creator: Nintendo of Europe
metadata.description:
01, 15, 20 Music by Koji Kondo. Original version from the Nintendo 64 Soundtrack Album
„Super Mario 64™ — It's a me, Mario!“. Remix Acoustic Department.

02 Music by Rare. Original version from the Nintendo 64 Soundtrack Album
„Diddy Kong™ Racing — Höher, schneller, weiter“.
Previously unreleased remix by Acoustic Department.

03-05, 10-13, 17 Music by Kenta“gon“Nagata. From the Nintendo 64 Soundtrack Album
„1080° — Ten Eighty™ Snowboarding“.

06, 07, 09 Music by Koji Kondo. Original version from the Nintendo 64 Soundtrack Album
„Lylat Wars™ — Sound of Lylat“. Remix by Acoustic Department.

08, 14, 16 Music by Koji Kondo. Original version from the Nintendo 64 Soundtrack Album
„The Legend of Zelda™ — Ocarina of Time™“. Remix by Acoustic Department.

18, 19 Music by Kazumi Tanaka. Original version from the Nintendo 64 Soundtrack Album
„Yoshi's Story — Love, peace & happiness“. Remix by Acoustic Department.


FOR PROMOTIONAL USE ONLY!
metadata.subject: Original Soundtrack; Remix
metadata.title: Nintendo Soundtrack Serie: N64Y2K Millennium Trax
